node.address: Centro Calle del Boquette No. 7-156 , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
We have supermarkets, shops and ATMs just a few steps away. Hotel Marie Real is close to the Clock Tower, Plaza Fernandez Madrid, Monument to India Catalina, Cathedral of Cartagena, variety of restaurants with all kinds of food, in front of the hotel there is a supermarket. For being a tourist site there is good security.

Our hotel has comfortable rooms with a modern touch within an old building.

At the hotel, each room includes a wardrobe. At Marie Real every room comes with a seating area.
An American breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.
At Marie Real guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub.
Popular points of interest near the hotel include Bolivar Park, Cartagena's Gold Museum and Palace of the Inquisition. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 7 km from Marie Real.
San Diego is a great choice for travellers interested in architecture, food and history.

description.description: The Hotel Marie Real located in the historic center of the city of Cartagena, close to the tourist sites of interest such as, Castillo de San Felipe, India Catalina and Torre del Reloj. We have a terrace with a magnificent view. Marie Real features air-conditioned rooms with cable flat-screen TV in the San Diego district of Cartagena de Indias. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi. The accommodation provides a shared lounge, dry cleaning services and organising tours for guests.
